oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aegypti Delta et Nili Ostia
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cellarius, Christoph 1638-1707
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: 1 map : hand color ; 20 x 30 cm. on sheet (25 x 31)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Shows boundaries, roads, rivers, towns and principal settlements. Also shows a part of the Arabian Peninsula. Publication date from the library's acquisition form.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Geography, Ancient; Nile River Delta (Egypt) -- Historical geography -- Early works to 1800 -- Maps; Egypt -- Historical geography -- Early works to 1800 -- Maps; Arabian Peninsula -- Early works to 1800 -- Maps; Early maps
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
